body:
For more detailed setup instructions, see https://rules-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/getting-started.html

For the user-facing changelog see [here](https://rules-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#v1-8-2)

## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_python", version = "1.8.2")

python = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:python.bzl", "python")
python.toolchain(
    python_version = "3.13",
)

pip = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:pip.bzl", "pip")
pip.parse(
    hub_name = "pypi",
    python_version = "3.13",
    requirements_lock = "//:requirements_lock.txt",
)

use_repo(pip, "pypi")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_python",
    sha256 = "6810ff4b137b62e86ce3cedfebeeb2c988d8c5a16c4fc8081da21ad8f998a141",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.8.2",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.8.2/rules_python-1.8.2.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")

py_repositories()
```

### Gazelle plugin

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_python_gazelle_plugin",
    sha256 = "6810ff4b137b62e86ce3cedfebeeb2c988d8c5a16c4fc8081da21ad8f998a141",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.8.2/gazelle",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.8.2/rules_python-1.8.2.tar.gz",
)

# To compile the rules_python gazelle extension from source,
# we must fetch some third-party go dependencies that it uses.

load("@rules_python_gazelle_plugin//:deps.bzl", _py_gazelle_deps = "gazelle_deps")

_py_gazelle_deps()
```


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/compare/1.8.1...1.8.2

## What's Changed
* chore: remove bcr app settings by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3370
* chore: make pypi release workflow perform checkout by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3371
* fix(gazelle) Delete python targets with invalid srcs by @yushan26 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3046
* revert(pypi): revert the default for pipstar by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3373
* fix: Add linux_riscv64 to _pip_repository_impl by @kxxt in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3350
* feat: Add libpython QNX platform support by @lalten in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3372
* build: change gazelle rules_python override to use bazelrc by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3382
* gazelle: set min rules_python version as 1.4 by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3383
* chore(toolchain): drop all but the latest 3.9 toolchain by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3377
* fix: make CI pass with the next version of Bazel (9.0.0rc1) by @jsing-canva in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3393
* Add batch_commands to presubmit.yml by @meteorcloudy in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3389
* fix(runfiles): correct Python runfiles path assumption by @jsing-canva in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3086
* chore: Bazel 9 is rc now by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3394
* chore: update to latest buildifier by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3386
* chore: switch bcr to 8.x instead of last_rc by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3395
* fix(local): Fix local_runtime use with free-threaded python by @laramiel in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3399
* refactor: defer zip manifest building to execution phase to improve analysis phase performance by @tobyh-canva in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3381
* fix(pip): allow for different extras for different target platforms  by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3385
* chore: make doc building use bootstrap script and venv site packages by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3403
* fix: use runfiles symlinks for venv symlink creation to reduce action count by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3402
* fix(gazelle): correct runfiles path handling in gazelle_python_manifest test by @timfallmk in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3398
* tests: set --windows_enable_symlinks in bzlmod example by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3409
* docs: Explain why the `lock` rule has no implicit test target by @martis42 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3411
* refactor(gazelle): Generate a modules map per wheel, then merge by @thejcannon in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3415
* docs: fix markdown by @dizzy57 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3417
* feat(toolchain): drop 3.8 and print info level messages about it by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3387
* fix: Avoid C++ toolchain requirement if possible by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2919
* doc: add documentation to the changelog about the removal of 3.8 by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3418
* fix: make python_headers targets compatible with layering checks by @keith in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3420
* fix(local) Add api3 targets and additional defines. by @laramiel in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3408
* chore: start cleaning up 3.9 usage from examples by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3419
* chore: enable disk cache for faster local builds by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3424
* chore(bazelrc): fix the update-deleted-packages script by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3425
* chore(toolchain): remove chmod and disable ignore_root_error by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3421
* ci: switch our jobs to mac arm64 by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3426
* docs: enable pipstar for doc building by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3427
* fix: add runfiles root for system_python bootstrap by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3423
* refactor(pypi): parse entry_points without Python by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3429
* chore: enable pipstar for experimental_index_url users by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3428
* fix(pip): do not add a pip-fallback when there is no sdist by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3432
* build(deps): bump actions/checkout from 5 to 6 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3433
* refactor(pypi): extract the wheel without python by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3430
* chore: remove extraneous dep from sys_path_order test by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3435
* refactor: remove gazelle plugin as dev dependency by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3436
* ci: add ci config to test 7 and 8 for bcr like setup by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3404
* feat(pip.parse): limit the target platforms we parse requirements for by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3441
* refactor(core): get_zip_runfiles_path should call startswith less by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3442
* ci: start testing BCR tests with bazel 9 by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3443
* doc: target_platforms by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3445
* chore(bzlmod): assume that we can always mark the extension as reproducible by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3444
* refactor: avoid conflict merging when shared libraries are present by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3448
* refactor: add mnemonics to some gazelle and sphinxdocs actions by @tyler-french in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3449
* fix(pip): Only directly extract .whl files in Bazel >9 by @armandomontanez in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3452
* feat(toolchains): Add 3.13.10, 3.13.11, 3.14.1, 3.14.2, 3.15.0a2 by @pjjw in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3451
* chore(pip): Check for whl extract compatibility in internal_config_repo.bzl by @armandomontanez in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3456
* fix(pip): set better defaults for the new target_platforms attr by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3447
* fix: correctly merge conflicting paths when files (instead of dirs) are being linked by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3458
* refactor(repo_utils): create a helper for extracting files by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3459
* refactor: optimize venv building for namespace packages by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3454
* chore: add missing py_internal dep to venv_runfiles by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3462
* fix: allow pypi packages with empty data attribute by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3463
* docs: Fix broken links to bzlmod build_file_generation example by @willstranton in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3464
* docs: fix link to releases page by @willstranton in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3467
* refactor: optimize venv creation for nvidia and pkgutil style namespace packages by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3460
* fix(pipstar): actually pass the extras down the call stack by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3468
* fix(pipstar): fix whl extraction and flip pipstar=true by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3461
* build(deps): bump bazel-contrib/publish-to-bcr/.github/workflows/publish.yaml from 1.0.0 to 1.1.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3465
* chore: update version markers for 1.8 release by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3472
* fix(venv): Fix all .so files missing when py_binary lives at //:BUILD by @shayanhoshyari in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3474

## New Contributors
* @jsing-canva made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3393
* @tobyh-canva made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3381
* @timfallmk made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3398
* @tyler-french made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3449
* @pjjw made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3451
* @willstranton made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3464

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/compare/1.7.0...1.8.0

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_python", version = "1.8.0-rc1")

python = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:python.bzl", "python")
python.toolchain(
    python_version = "3.13",
)

pip = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:pip.bzl", "pip")
pip.parse(
    hub_name = "pypi",
    python_version = "3.13",
    requirements_lock = "//:requirements_lock.txt",
)

use_repo(pip, "pypi")
```

```starlark
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.8.0-rc1/rules_python-1.8.0-rc1.tar.gz",
```

### Gazelle plugin

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_python_gazelle_plugin",
    sha256 = "a8d24cb0d53d8df4ef08741d70157f19481bb577a956b7de2cd445bc393e625b",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.8.0-rc1/gazelle",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.8.0-rc1/rules_python-1.8.0-rc1.tar.gz",
)

# To compile the rules_python gazelle extension from source,
# we must fetch some third-party go dependencies that it uses.

load("@rules_python_gazelle_plugin//:deps.bzl", _py_gazelle_deps = "gazelle_deps")

_py_gazelle_deps()
```

For the user-facing changelog see [here](https://rules-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#v1-7-0)

## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_python", version = "1.7.0")

python = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:python.bzl", "python")
python.toolchain(
    python_version = "3.13",
)

pip = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:pip.bzl", "pip")
pip.parse(
    hub_name = "pypi",
    python_version = "3.13",
    requirements_lock = "//:requirements_lock.txt",
)

use_repo(pip, "pypi")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_python",
    sha256 = "f609f341d6e9090b981b3f45324d05a819fd7a5a56434f849c761971ce2c47da",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.7.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.7.0/rules_python-1.7.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")

py_repositories()
```

### Gazelle plugin

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_python_gazelle_plugin",
    sha256 = "f609f341d6e9090b981b3f45324d05a819fd7a5a56434f849c761971ce2c47da",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.7.0/gazelle",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.7.0/rules_python-1.7.0.tar.gz",
)

# To compile the rules_python gazelle extension from source,
# we must fetch some third-party go dependencies that it uses.

load("@rules_python_gazelle_plugin//:deps.bzl", _py_gazelle_deps = "gazelle_deps")

_py_gazelle_deps()
```

## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_python", version = "1.7.0-rc6")

python = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:python.bzl", "python")
python.toolchain(
    python_version = "3.13",
)

pip = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:pip.bzl", "pip")
pip.parse(
    hub_name = "pypi",
    python_version = "3.13",
    requirements_lock = "//:requirements_lock.txt",
)

use_repo(pip, "pypi")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

    name = "rules_python",
    sha256 = "df04602e341fe0414d3774b5297c34cbcd8d9e0a525d28a87c25adae4588c11d",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.7.0-rc6",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.7.0-rc6/rules_python-1.7.0-rc6.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")

```

## What's Changed
* test(venv): functional test for pth files by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3343
* docs: Fix GitHub PR links by @thejcannon in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3346
* build: Starlarkify python flags by @mai93 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3334
* doc: Fix `pip.default` arguments in multi-platform example by @hartikainen in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3358
* chore(toolchain): use the last build and add 3.15.0a1 by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3357
* fix(doc): fix the release notes for the starlarkification of the flags by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3361
* chore: switch to use publish-to-bcr workflow by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3359
* chore: fix create_archive_and_notes to ignore release tool markers by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3355
* chore: make gazelle bcr tests compatible with bcr presubmit environment by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3365
* chore: fix release workflow by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3366
* Merge main -> release/1.7 by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3369

## New Contributors
* @thejcannon made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3346
* @hartikainen made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3358

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/compare/1.7.0-rc0...1.7.0-rc1

## What's Changed
* fix(bootstrap): handle when runfiles env vars don't point to current binary's runfiles by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3192
* docs: fix a couple typos in the changelog by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3208
* chore: release helper tool by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3206
* docs: fix changelog header anchors by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3207
* fix(gazelle): Do not build proto targets with default Gazelle by @dougthor42 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3216
* chore: create workflow to check the do-not-merge label by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3213
* docs: Add 1.5.4 release notes to changelog by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3221
* build(deps): bump requests from 2.32.4 to 2.32.5 in /tools/publish by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3214
* docs: tell how to push one tag; that rc start with n=0 by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3222
* build(deps): bump typing-extensions from 4.14.1 to 4.15.0 in /docs by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3212
* build(deps): bump requests from 2.32.4 to 2.32.5 in /docs by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3211
* cleanup: remove support for extra actions by @comius in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3210
* build(deps): bump docutils from 0.21.2 to 0.22 in /docs by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3166
* chore: add AGENTS.md to help AI agents work with rules_python by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3227
* build(deps): bump rich from 13.9.4 to 14.1.0 in /tools/publish by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3230
* build(deps): bump charset-normalizer from 3.4.2 to 3.4.3 in /tools/publish by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3231
* chore: allow release workflow to be manually run and skip pypi upload by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3232
* chore: make release tool auto detect next version by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3219
* build(deps): bump cryptography from 44.0.1 to 45.0.7 in /tools/publish by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3235
* build(deps): bump jeepney from 0.8.0 to 0.9.0 in /tools/publish by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3234
* build(deps): bump keyring from 25.5.0 to 25.6.0 in /tools/publish by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3236
* build(deps): bump importlib-metadata from 8.5.0 to 8.7.0 in /tools/publish by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3237
* refactor(gazelle): report missing BUILD_WORKSPACE_DIRECTORY key more directly by @ctcjab in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3240
* chore(deps): bump rules_cc to 0.1.5 by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3238
* fix(sphinxdocs): add retry logic when exit code 2 occurs by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3241
* fix(system_python): write import paths to generated file instead of using PYTHONPATH by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3242
* refactor(pypi): split out a hub_builder helper from the extension code by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3243
* chore: add GEMINI.md, have it load AGENTS.md by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3246
* docs: fix pr doc builds by removing external_version_warning plugin by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3244
* refactor: migrate tests to use hub_builder instead of full integration by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3247
* build(deps): bump zipp from 3.20.2 to 3.23.0 in /tools/publish by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3253
* build(deps): bump more-itertools from 10.7.0 to 10.8.0 in /tools/publish by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3254
* feat: allow registering arbitrary settings for py_binary transitions by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3248
* fix: ensure the stage1 bootstrap is executable by @EdSchouten in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3258
* fix: don't call Args.add() with an integer by @EdSchouten in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3259
* docs: update changelog for config_settings attribute by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3257
* chore: add agents guidance for creating bzl_library targets by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3264
* docs: improve whl_library documentation by @baxelrod-bdai in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3266
* refactor: use common_labels.bzl for labels used across files by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3263
* fix(pypi): select the lowest available libc version by default by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3255
* tests: add non-blocking ci config for bazel rolling by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3272
* fix: venv site packages with pkgutil packages by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3268
* build(deps): bump pycparser from 2.22 to 2.23 in /tools/publish by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3271
* build(deps): bump cffi from 1.17.1 to 2.0.0 in /tools/publish by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3270
* build: remove no-op _native_rules_allowlist by @mai93 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3275
* build(deps): bump pkginfo from 1.10.0 to 1.12.1.2 in /tools/publish by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3229
* tests: make py_cc_toolchain test of headers/includes work with Bazel 9 by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3276
* chore(docs): remove duplicate bzlmod guidance by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3278
* chore: remove non-toolchain runtime resolution logic. by @gregestren in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3280
* feat(toolchains): ABI3 Python headers target by @nicholasjng in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3274
* docs: move 1.6.3 related changelog by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3284
* refactor: read migrated native flags through a centralized accessor function by @gregestren in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3290
* build(deps): bump docutils from 0.21.2 to 0.22.2 in /docs by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3287
* build(deps): bump jaraco-functools from 4.1.0 to 4.3.0 in /tools/publish by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3288
* docs: add example for a complex multi-platform pypi configuration by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3292
* feat(runfiles): support for --incompatible_compact_repo_mapping_manifest by @jklukas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3277
* chore: cleanup bazel flags related to bazel 6 or below by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3282
* refactor: rename symbols in re-exports by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3300
* chore: use python.defaults to set rules_python default python version by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3301
* docs: fix spelling of venvs_site_packages flag in changelog by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3302
* fix(uv): make uv lock rule work with platform python runtime by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3303
* docs: add config bzlmod extension to docs by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3305
* fix: handle urls without release id format by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3306

For more detailed setup instructions, see https://rules-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/getting-started.html

For the user-facing changelog see [here](https://rules-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#v1-6-3)

## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_python", version = "1.6.3")

python = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:python.bzl", "python")
python.toolchain(
    python_version = "3.13",
)

pip = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:pip.bzl", "pip")
pip.parse(
    hub_name = "pypi",
    python_version = "3.13",
    requirements_lock = "//:requirements_lock.txt",
)

use_repo(pip, "pypi")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_python",
    sha256 = "2f5c284fbb4e86045c2632d3573fc006facbca5d1fa02976e89dc0cd5488b590",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.6.3",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.6.3/rules_python-1.6.3.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")

py_repositories()
```

### Gazelle plugin

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_python_gazelle_plugin",
    sha256 = "2f5c284fbb4e86045c2632d3573fc006facbca5d1fa02976e89dc0cd5488b590",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.6.3/gazelle",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.6.3/rules_python-1.6.3.tar.gz",
)

# To compile the rules_python gazelle extension from source,
# we must fetch some third-party go dependencies that it uses.

load("@rules_python_gazelle_plugin//:deps.bzl", _py_gazelle_deps = "gazelle_deps")

_py_gazelle_deps()
```

For more detailed setup instructions, see https://rules-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/getting-started.html

For the user-facing changelog see [here](https://rules-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#v1-5-4)

## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_python", version = "1.5.4")

python = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:python.bzl", "python")
python.toolchain(
    python_version = "3.13",
)

pip = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:pip.bzl", "pip")
pip.parse(
    hub_name = "pypi",
    python_version = "3.13",
    requirements_lock = "//:requirements_lock.txt",
)

use_repo(pip, "pypi")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_python",
    sha256 = "13671d304cfe43350302213a60d93a5fc0b763b0a6de17397e3e239253b61b73",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.5.4",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.5.4/rules_python-1.5.4.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")

py_repositories()
```

### Gazelle plugin

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_python_gazelle_plugin",
    sha256 = "13671d304cfe43350302213a60d93a5fc0b763b0a6de17397e3e239253b61b73",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.5.4/gazelle",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.5.4/rules_python-1.5.4.tar.gz",
)

# To compile the rules_python gazelle extension from source,
# we must fetch some third-party go dependencies that it uses.

load("@rules_python_gazelle_plugin//:deps.bzl", _py_gazelle_deps = "gazelle_deps")

_py_gazelle_deps()
```

* chore(pypi): remove unused config setting code by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3065
* deps(gazelle): upgrade rules_go to remove patching of tree-sitter by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3179
* fix(pypi): correctly handle different package versions by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3186
* style: Print coverage return codes in verbose mode by @phst in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3190
* fix(py_wheel): add directories in deterministic order by @jwnimmer-tri in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3194
* feat: freethreaded support for the builder API by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3063
* docs: correctly spell release in devguide by @honglooker in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3201
* fix(toolchains): Add Xcode repo env vars to local_runtime_repo for better cache invalidation by @pennig in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/3203

## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_python", version = "1.4.2")

python = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:python.bzl", "python")
python.toolchain(
    python_version = "3.13",
)

pip = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:pip.bzl", "pip")
pip.parse(
    hub_name = "pypi",
    python_version = "3.13",
    requirements_lock = "//:requirements_lock.txt",
)

use_repo(pip, "pypi")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_python",
    sha256 = "daf1c27517e8526c212195345b4f6f02dd8cad69aa099d3bdb11868458211829",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.4.2",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.4.2/rules_python-1.4.2.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")

py_repositories()
```

### Gazelle plugin

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_python_gazelle_plugin",
    sha256 = "daf1c27517e8526c212195345b4f6f02dd8cad69aa099d3bdb11868458211829",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.4.2/gazelle",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.4.2/rules_python-1.4.2.tar.gz",
)

# To compile the rules_python gazelle extension from source,
# we must fetch some third-party go dependencies that it uses.

load("@rules_python_gazelle_plugin//:deps.bzl", _py_gazelle_deps = "gazelle_deps")

_py_gazelle_deps()
```

## What's Changed
* fix: declare PyInfo as provided by test/binary/library by @layus in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2777
* fix: load target_platforms through the hub by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2781
* chore: remove a stray file by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2795
* build(deps): bump sphinx-rtd-theme from 3.0.1 to 3.0.2 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2802
* build(deps): bump astroid from 3.3.6 to 3.3.9 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2803
* build(deps): bump packaging from 24.2 to 25.0 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2804
* fix: fixes to prepare for making bootstrap=script the default for Linux by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2760
* fix: escape more invalid repo string characters by @keith in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2801
* fix: parsing metadata with inline licenses by @keith in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2806
* test(pypi): add a test case for simpleapi html parsing with % by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2811
* build: Run pre-commit everywhere by @brandonchinn178 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2808
* refactor/docs: improve compile_pip_requirements error message and docs by @brandonchinn178 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2792
* feat: Have `pip_compile` generate a `*.test` target; deprecate `*_test` by @dougthor42 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2812
* fix: try multiple times to get win32 version to handle flakes by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2814

* docs: generate docs for py_common, PyInfoBuilder APIs by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2920

* docs/refactor: Use python.defaults, not is_default by @vonschultz in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2924
* fix: Normalize main script path in Python bootstrap by @mering in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2925
* refactor: also rename host toolchain impl function name by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2930
* tests: refactor py_reconfig rules so less boilerplate is needed to add attrs by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2933
* feat: add shebang attribute on py_console_script_binary by @chrisirhc in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2867
* fix: update the stub type alias names by @kaycebasques in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2929
* refactor: reimplement writing namespace pkgs in Starlark by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2882
* cleanup(pycross): remove the partially migrated code by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2906
* refactor(pypi): return a list from parse_requirements by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2931
* fix: symlink root-level python files to the venv by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2908
* docs: split PyPI docs up and add more by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2935
* refactor: change site_packages_symlinks to venv_symlinks by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2939
* docs: fix sphinxdocs mis-redirect by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2940
* feat: allow custom platform when overriding by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2880
* feat: Support constraints in pip_compile by @vihangm in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2916
* fix(pypi): allow pip_compile to work with read-only sources by @rbeasley-avgo in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2712
* feat(uv): handle credential helpers and .netrc by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2872
* fix(pypi): correctly aggregate the requirements files by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2932
* fix(pypi): inherit proxy env variables in compile_pip_requirements test by @herewasmike in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2941
* feat: add persistent worker for sphinxdocs by @kaycebasques in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2938
* fix: Updating setuptools to patch CVE-2025-47273 by @aaronmaxlevy in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2955
* feat: data and pyi files in the venv by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2936
* fix(pypi): Only show index_url_overrides warnings when they are needed by @thirtyseven in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2967
* revert: change default bootstrap back to system_python by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2968
* fix: grammar in an error message by @benjaminp in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2971
* refactor: Add missing uses of DefaultInfo by @keith in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2972
* docs: fix typo in toolchains.md example code by @honglooker in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2970
* chore: prepare for 1.5 release by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2973
* fix: support pre-release versions and add new toolchain versions by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2969

name: 1.5.0-rc4
body:
For more detailed setup instructions, see https://rules-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/getting-started.html

For the user-facing changelog see [here](https://rules-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#v1-5-0-rc4)

## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_python", version = "1.5.0-rc4")

python = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:python.bzl", "python")
python.toolchain(
    python_version = "3.13",
)

pip = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:pip.bzl", "pip")
pip.parse(
    hub_name = "pypi",
    python_version = "3.13",
    requirements_lock = "//:requirements_lock.txt",
)

use_repo(pip, "pypi")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_python",
    sha256 = "8b98bfab75cd469bd5f9b63dc48a2f652b0348880006e5cb8299f4ee04292a95",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.5.0-rc4",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.5.0-rc4/rules_python-1.5.0-rc4.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")

py_repositories()
```

### Gazelle plugin

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_python_gazelle_plugin",
    sha256 = "8b98bfab75cd469bd5f9b63dc48a2f652b0348880006e5cb8299f4ee04292a95",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.5.0-rc4/gazelle",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.5.0-rc4/rules_python-1.5.0-rc4.tar.gz",
)

# To compile the rules_python gazelle extension from source,
# we must fetch some third-party go dependencies that it uses.

load("@rules_python_gazelle_plugin//:deps.bzl", _py_gazelle_deps = "gazelle_deps")

_py_gazelle_deps()
```


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/compare/1.5.0-rc3...1.5.0-rc4
